page.title: 13 Transport,Stebbing
page.content: The buses come to Stebbing every Wednesday and Saturday.They come at 9.00 and come back around 12.00 to 1.00.You can catch the bus in the High Street.The bus takes you to Braintree and brings you back again. If you work in London you drive some of the way and then catch the underground if you want to get there quicker. The minibus is used by clubs in Stebbing and used a lot by the school.You book it and you can take it wherever you like.It is used for trips by the over 60's club and scouts,cubs, guides and brownies. Each family needs at least one car to get around,to take their children to school and get themselves to work.
